Displaying Profiling Graphs

The tapestry-perf4j is made of 2 Tapestry components.

The basic usage is:

<t:container xmlns:t="http://tapestry.apache.org/schema/tapestry_5_1_0.xsd" title="Performance">
    <h4>Performance</h4>
    <span t:id="graphs" t:type="perf4j/Graphs"/>
</t:container>

The graphs component displays a combo box populated with the list of available graphs. On each graph selection, the corresponding graph is displayed with the help of an AJAX update.

The reference documentation for the provided components is available for more information.
